name: prompts.text
text:
Our Bot Builder SDK has a rich set of built-in prompts that simplify asking the user a series of questions. This demo will walk you through using each prompt. Just follow the prompts and you can quit at any time by saying 'cancel'.
Prompts.text()

Enter some text and I'll say it back.

name: prompts.number
text:
You entered '{{ dialog.text }}'
Prompts.number()

Now enter a number.

name: prompts.choice
text:
You entered '{{ dialog.number }}'
Bot Builder includes a rich choice() prompt that lets you offer a user a list choices to pick from. On Facebook these choices by default surface using Quick Replies if there are 10 or less choices. If there are more than 10 choices a numbered list will be used but you can specify the exact type of list to show using the ListStyle property.Prompts.choice()

Choose a list style (the default is auto.)
